title: Bill Evans - Interplay (1962) RESEED
description:
MP3/320kbps

Although pianist Bill Evans had been recording as a leader steadily since 1959 (with one date in 1956), it wasn&#039;t until this 1962 session -- one of his first after returning to active playing a year after bassist Scott LaFaro&#039;s tragic death -- that he introduced a horn. Evans is featured with trumpeter Freddie Hubbard, guitarist Jim Hall, bassist Percy Heath, and drummer Philly Joe Jones performing five veteran standards (highlighted by "You and the Night and the Music," "You Go to My Head," and "Wrap Your Troubles in Dreams"), plus the pianist&#039;s blues "Interplay." Excellent music. [The CD reissue also adds a second take of "I&#039;ll Never Smile Again."] ~ All Music Guide 

Personnel:
Bill Evans - Piano 
Jim Hall - Guitar
Philly Joe Jones - Drums
Percy Heath - Bass
Freddie Hubbard -Trumpet

Track Listing:
1.You and the Night and the Music (Howard Dietz, Arthur Schwartz) 7:04
2.When You Wish upon a Star (Leigh Harline, Ned Washington) 5:45
3.I&#039;ll Never Smile Again [Take 7] (Ruth Lowe) 6:32
4.Interplay (Bill Evans) 8:14
5.You Go to My Head (J. Fred Coots, Haven Gillespie) 5:06
6.Wrap Your Troubles in Dreams (Harry Barris, Billy Moll, Ted Koehler) 6:24
7.I&#039;ll Never Smile Again [Take 6] (Ruth Lowe) 6:38
